Acute postoperative pain currently manage largely opioids co-administration nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) . Opioids highly effective manage acute postoperative pain , however dose often limited side effect respiratory depression , nausea vomiting , sedation . NSAIDS administer reduce opioid use , may also limit side effect , gastrointestinal toxicity platelet dysfunction . New strategy manage acute postoperative pain would provide clinical benefit .
